metadata.title: RHBA-2020:4346: Satellite 6.7.5 Async Bug Fix Update (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat Satellite is a system management solution that allows organizations to configure and maintain their systems without the necessity to provide public Internet access to their servers or other client systems. It performs provisioning and configuration management of predefined standard operating environments.

This update fixes the following bugs:

1826603	Remote execution job fails with TypeError (no implicit conversion of Array into String
1846670	Unable to apply all Errata via Remote Execution on Web UI with "Select All"
1869170	When delete the hypervisor from satellite, the manifest will be broken
1881186	Backport of bugzilla 1871873 to Satellite 6.7/Candlepin 2.9
1884006	Hits Sync uses only old proxy setting
1884009	Hostgroup tag is never reported in slice
1884021	Unable to sync large openshift docker repos
1884025	[Regression] Hammer export-legacy Fails with Composite Content Views
1884026	Hypervisors from Satellite, never makes their way to HBI
1884027	After data upload from satellite UI it is not visible on cloud.redhat.com.
1884029	build pxe default do not work when more than 1 provider

Users of Red Hat Satellite are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-14380 Satellite: Local user impersonation by Single sign-on (SSO) user leads to account takeover
